page.title: 02Population in the Haywoods
page.content: Although there are some families who 'belong' to the villages, the great majority of families have moved to the area. People travel to work in Stafford, Rugeley, Stoke, Uttoxeter, Wolverhampton or even further to Birmingham, travelling largely by car or using the bus services to Stafford and Rugeley. Bikes are also a popular means of transport to work. Increasingly retired couples are buying property in Great Haywood, while just a few years ago many young couples were moving in and starting families before moving on. Few families have no car and many have more than one.
